resources.string: In order to bypass issues with the Play Store testing, a conditional to skip when testing is on:
Word dictionary list is taken from this source and stored as a txt file:
Media player did not seem to create properly on lower APIs. The ToneGenerator class helped to provide the beep.

\ This game is a combination of Scrabble and Boogle. There are two rounds. In each round, you are presented with a board divided into 9 sections.
\ 
\Each section represents a 9 letter word. Try to figure make the longest word you can. When you switch boards, your answer is locked and you can't change it. You will have 90 seconds per round to get the longest words possible. Bonus points are awarded for correct words with 9 letters. Points are subtracted for any incorrect words. 

\Good luck and happy playing!
\"Clippity Clop\" by Eric Matyas from www.soundimage.org
\Letter and menu icons from Icons8 https://icons8.com
